name: check_for_disposable_emails
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool email_existence_validator.
Tool description: API which checks if email really exist on server or not.
It check for different parameters for giving end results .
Check for MX records, SMTP deliverability, Disposable check and many more.
API description: Checks if the given email address is disposable or temporary using the Email Existence Validator API.

email.description: The email address to check for disposability.
